EmailTemplate.name: Joining Instruction Booking Confirmed
EmailTemplate.subject: British Safety Council Booking Confirmation , Reference {!Contact.Opportunity_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your booking with the British Safety Council for the below Product(s) has been confirmed.
{!Contact.Opportunity_Product_List__c}
You will shortly receive an invoice for the cost of this booking.
Please read the contents of the attached document carefully and follow the web links which contain important information regarding your booking, including location and course content information.
If you have any questions regarding this matter please contact your British Safety Council Account Manager {!Account.OwnerFullName} ({!Account.OwnerPhone}) or the Customer Service Team on +44 (0)20 8741 1231 quoting your booking reference {!Contact.Opportunity_Number__c}.
Kind regards,
British Safety Council
